text: is a Japanese football player for Mito HollyHock. ==Career== Born to a Japanese mother and a Nigerian father, Boniface joined Mito HollyHock in December 2017. ==Club statistics== Updated to end of 2018 season.Nippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社, "J1&J2;&J3;選手名鑑ハンディ版 2018 (NSK MOOK)", 7 February 2018, Japan, (p. 208 out of 289) {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center;" |- ! colspan=3 | Club performance ! colspan=2 | League ! colspan=2 | Cup ! colspan=2 | Total |- !
